message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you highlighting the uniqueness of the product.  While I'm interested, $950000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $800000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that 800000 is a bit below my target price, but I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for 900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $900000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm confident I can get this product closer to my budget.  I'll stick with my offer of $800000. If that's not acceptable, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than 875000. This is the absolute minimum I'm willing to accept for this product. I'm confident that it's still a great deal, and I'm willing to wait for the right buyer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to move forward.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but $875000 is still a bit outside my comfort zone. I'm willing to go up to $850000. This is my final offer, and if it's not acceptable, I'll have to move on to other options.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, and I respect that. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than 875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between 850000 and 875000, which would be 862500. This is the best I can do, and I'm willing to compromise to get this deal done.
